title: The Blue Witch
description: Taken from the legendarium of the ancient tales of Arva, The Blue Witch retells the legend of Prince KÃ²dobos, his knights, his love for Enolia and the great war that was waged to rescue her from a jealous king. It also tells of the coming of a menacing witch and the fall of a great kingdom. Hearken to a tale of mighty warriors, lusty maidens, and foul treachery. The Blue Witch awaits you!
author: Kevis Hendrickson
